Gary Taylor, amụrụ na Los Angeles, California, bụ ónyé America na-agụ egwu, ónyé na-ede egwu, ónyé nwéré ọtụtụ ngwá egwu, na ónyé na-emepụta ihe.
Ọtụtụ ndị na-ese egwu edekọla egwu ya, gụnyere Grover Washington, Jr

("Keep in Touch"), Anita Baker ("Good Love"), Walter Beasley, Lonnie Liston Smith, George Clinton & P-Funk Allstars, Vanessa Rubin ("Living Without a Heart"), na The Whispers ("Just Gets Better with Time, "My Heart Your Heart").
Dị ka ónyé na-agụ egwú, Taylor pụtara na The Whispers' R&B #1 "Rock Steady," na "My Flame" màkà Vanessa Williams, yana Nancy Wilson.

Dị ka onye na-ede egwu na ónyé na-emepụta ihe, Maazị Taylor arụwo ọrụ na ndị ọrụ ochie abụọ ahụ, dị ka Anita Baker ("Good Love") na The Whispers ("Just Gets Better With Time," "My Heart, Your Heart"), na ndị na-ese ihe ọhụrụ dị ka Lalah Hathaway ("I'm Coming Back") n'etiti ha.

Taylor bụkwa nwá nwanne nné nkè ónyé na-ede egwu na ónyé na-emepụta Skip Scarborough. Taylor kpuchiri egwu Scarborough dere màkà The Emotions, "Don't Ask My Neighbors" na album ya nke afọ 1988, Compassion
